title: Whispering Willows (GOG) Giveaway
description: Don’t miss out on this adventure! Whispering Willows is up for grabs FREE on GOG! Dive into a beautifully hand-drawn 2D world full of puzzles, mystery, and not-so-friendly ghosts. Grab it while it’s hot, and see if you can unravel the secrets...
instructions:
1. Click the "Go to giveaway" green button and you will be redirected to the GOG home page
2. Scroll down until you find the game banner.
3. Click the "Get it Free" button and login into your GOG account to unlock the game.

title: Get The Witcher: Enhanced Edition for FREE!
description: Starting today, all GOG users can grab a free copy of The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut! You just need to follow the instructions below!
instructions: 1. Download the GOG GALAXY App. 2. Go to the "Recent" view and check the banner at the top. 3. Then click the giveaway button. After a while, the game will show up in your library.
